Title: Relates to special accidental death benefits for certain deceased paid employees of the city of New York or the New York city health and hospitals corporation
Summary: Relates to special accidental death benefits for certain deceased paid employees of the city of New York or the New York city health and hospitals corporation whose duties are to provide medical, behavioral health, dental, or other health-related services.
LawCode: Amd ยง208-f, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to special accidental death benefits for certain deceased paid employees of the city of New York or the New York city health and hospitals corporation
